sen.j: 藤原 成子（ふじわら の しげこ、生年不詳 - 安元3年3月11日 (旧暦)（1177年4月5日））は、平安時代後期・後白河天皇後宮の女官。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Nariko (the birth year is unknown - April 5, 1177) was a court lady of kokyu (empress's residence) of Emperor Goshirakawa in the late Heian period.
FUJIWARA no Nariko (year of birth unknown - April 5, 1177) was a court lady of the Kokyu (residence of the empress) of Emperor Goshirakawa during the late Heian period.
sen.cmt: fixed to read more naturally
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Nariko (year of birth unknown - April 18, 1177) was a court lady of the Kokyu (residence of the empress) of Emperor Goshirakawa during the late Heian period.
sen.cmt: April 5 をApril 18 に修正しました。※ウィキペディアでは「しげこ」となっておりますが、正確には「なりこ」のようです。http://kotobank.jp/word/%E8%97%A4%E5%8E%9F%E6%88%90%E5%AD%90

sen.j: 閑院流大納言藤原季成の娘。
sen.e: She was a daughter of Kanin line, dainagon FUJIWARA no Suenari.
She was a daughter of the Dainagon (chief councilor of state) FUJIWARA no Suenari, who was of the Kanin line.
sen.cmt: added description of Dainagon to coincide with the word list; fixed word order to read more naturally
sen.e: She was a daughter of the Dainagon (chief councilor of state) FUJIWARA no Suenari, who was of the Kanin line.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: She was also known as Takakura-Sanmi no tsubone.
She was also known as Takakura-Sanmi no Tsubone.
sen.cmt: capitalized "Tsubone"
sen.e: She was also known as Takakura-Sanmi no Tsubone.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: She was a menoto (a woman providing breast-feed to a highborn baby).
She was a menoto (a wet nurse for a highborn baby).
sen.cmt: a woman providing breast-feed→a wet nurse
sen.e: She was a wet nurse of Emperor Rokujo.
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に従い、menoto (a wet nurse for a highborn baby) をwet nurse に修正しました。「六条天皇の」訳漏れのためof Emperor Rokujo を追記しました。

sen.j: 藤原璋子の姪で、後白河天皇とは従姉妹にあたる。
sen.e: She was a niece of FUJIWARA no Shoshi and a cousin of Emperor Goshirakawa.
Nariko was a niece of FUJIWARA no Shoshi and a cousin of the Emperor Goshirakawa.
sen.cmt: changed "She" to "Nariko" since this is a new paragraph
sen.e: Nariko was a niece of FUJIWARA no Shoshi and a cousin of the Emperor Goshirakawa.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 邸宅が三条高倉にあったことから、高倉三位と呼ばれた。
sen.e: She was also called Takakura-Sanmi because her residence was located at Sanjo Takakura.
She was also called "Takakura-Sanmi" due to her residence being located at Sanjo Takakura.
sen.cmt: fixed to read more naturally
sen.e: She was also called "Takakura-Sanmi" due to her residence being located at Sanjo Takakura.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 天皇の即位前から10年余にわたって寵愛を受け、守覚法親王、以仁王、亮子内親王（殷富門院）、式子内親王、好子内親王、休子内親王ら二男四女を相次いでもうけた。
sen.e: She started to win the emperor's favor before the emperor's enthronement and received it for about 10 years, giving birth in succession two sons and four daughters: Cloistered Imperial Prince Shukaku, Mochihitoo, Imperial Princess Ryoshi (Inpumonin), Imperial Princess Shikishi, Imperial Princess Koshi, and Imperial Princess Kyushi
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Nariko began winning the emperor's favor before his enthronment, receiving it for about ten years and giving birth in succession to two sons and four daughters: Cloistered Imperial Prince Shuhaku, Mochihitoo, Imperial Princess Ryoshi (Inpumonin (empress dowager)), Imperial Princess Shikishi, Imperial Princess Koshi and Imperial Princess Kyushi.
sen.cmt: added description of "Inpumonin" (empress dowager); changed "She" to "Nariko"
sen.e: Nariko began winning the emperor's favor before his enthronement, receiving it for about ten years and giving birth in succession to two sons and four daughters: Cloistered Imperial Prince Shuhaku, Prince Mochihito, Imperial Princess Ryoshi (Empress Dowager Inpumonin), Imperial Princess Shikishi, Imperial Princess Koshi and Imperial Princess Kyushi.
sen.cmt: enthronment をenthronement に修正しました。用語集の表記に従い、Mochihitoo をPrince Mochihito に修正しました。出典：http://books.google.com/books?id=w4f5FrmIJKIC&pg=PA127&dq=Prince+Mochihito&lr=&as_brr=3&hl=ja&cd=2#v=onepage&q=Prince%20Mochihito&f=falseInpumonin (empress dowager) をEmpress Dowager Inpumonin に修正しました。

sen.j: しかし平滋子のように正式な妃（女御）として重んじられることはなかった。
sen.e: However she was not given a status of a wife (nyogo(consort)) as high as TAIRA no Shigeko.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: However, she was not given the status of a wife (nyogo (oonsort)) as high as TAIRA no Shigeko.
sen.cmt: added comma, fixed grammar
sen.e: However, she was not given the status of a legal wife (nyogo (consort)) as high as TAIRA no Shigeko.
sen.cmt: 正式な妃（女御）a wife (nyogo (oonsort)) をa legal wife (nyogo (consort)) に修正しました。

sen.j: 安元3年（1177年）、従三位で薨去。
sen.e: In 1177, she died in the court rank of Junior third.
At the time of her death in 1177, Nariko held the court rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
sen.cmt: added "Jusanmi" to coincide with the word list
sen.e: At the time of her death in 1177, Nariko held the court rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
sen.cmt: 修正なし
